title: Speaking Out Against Evil and Doing It Poorly Part 2
description:
things that are objectively evil 

child molestation
rape
murdering someone in cold blood
giving children gender reassignment
3rd trimester abortion
treating people differently and antagonizing people based off of race or sexuality
leaving Americans behind in Afghanistan and not taking responsibility for it
manipulating housing and stock markets and then bailing out the people who do it after there greed causes economic collapse
endless money printing
endless wars in the middle east
using the media to terrorize its own citizens using fear tactics
forcing people to receive experimental medicine by taking away their ability to work and travel 

being a coward and not speaking out against these things for the last 30 years I've been alive 

these things are evil
the people who are doing these evil things must be stopped
not through revolution or by obtaining power
but by speaking out against these things and saying that it is wrong
this is not my opinion or perspective
you do not have to be a pastor or even a Christian to agree with this. It doesn't matter if you believe in Buddha, Allah, or your a scientologist. It doesn't matter if you've never been involved with any of this or you yourself have committed one of these acts. Evil is evil. We know what it is. It can be defined.


Romans 12:21
Be not overcome of evil, but overcome evil with good. 

Proverbs 28:1 
The wicked flee when no one pursues, but the righteous are bold as a lion. 

2 Timothy 1:7
For God gave us a spirit not of fear but of power and love and self-control.


Ephesians 5:11
Take no part in the unfruitful works of darkness, but instead expose them
